title: Galaxy Digital Has Several Positive Catalysts in Play This Year: Canaccord
description: The crypto firm’s fourth quarter was solid, and commentary about the performance through the end of February was even better, the report said.

title: Hong Kong-Based Asset Manager VSFG and Value Partners Apply for Spot Bitcoin ETF
description: Asset Manager VSFG, together with its partners, Value Partners, have applied for a spot-bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF) with Hong Kong's Securities and Futures Commission (SFC), its Head of Investment & Products Brian Chan told CoinDesk on Wednesday.

title: Ripple’s XRPL blockchain plugs into cross-chain DeFi
description:
Ripple helped build an ecosystem automated market maker protocol in close partnership with the XRP Ledger blockchain community.

Ripple’s underlying XRPL blockchain is set to unlock a wide range of decentralized finance (DeFi) capabilities following the launch of a natively built automated market maker protocol.

Ripple recently announced the release of the XLS-30 AMM protocol, built in partnership with the XRPL community, as a feature to benefit its blockchain ecosystem.

The AMM is expected to expand the DeFi capabilities of the XRPL ecosystem and enable cross-chain DeFi use cases across 50 blockchains.

Read more

title: KuCoin claims stability and safety following US indictment

title: Spot Bitcoin ETFs record recovery, cups $418 million intraday inflows

title: Bitcoin Ready To ‘Teleport Higher’ After Pulling Head Fake, Says Real Vision Analyst Jamie Coutts
description:
